entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
